data.what_is: Marketing Automation platform with social media/internet monitoring, e-PR tools, social media manager, advanced KPIs and pivot reporting
data.product_description: Marketing Automation platform with social media/internet monitoring, e-PR tools, social media manager, advanced KPIs and pivot reporting

pricing_plans.plan_description: or $230 per month when billed monthly
plan_features: 5 000 contacts in Marketing Automation scenarios monthly
up to 20 000 views of your websites monthly

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about iPresso?
Using this software has changed the way I schedule my day as a marketer. I am able to organize my campaigns in the same place I store my contacts. It is a must have for busy marketers like myself.

What do you dislike about iPresso?
I wish there was a mobile site I could use on the go to help keep up with my schedule and appointments.

Recommendations to others considering iPresso:
Try it out!

What problems is iPresso solving and how is that benefiting you?
Time management, organizing of content and clients, templates for marketing.
